transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .contain{background-color:#f8f7fa;float:right;margin-top:77.6px;min-height:calc(100vh - 77.6px);overflow-x:hidden;padding:16px;position:relative;transition:all .3s linear;width:100%}@media (max-width:600px){.contain{margin-top:55px;min-height:calc(100vh - 55px)}}.contain.shrink{width:calc(100% - 260px)}@media (max-width:600px){.contain.shrink{width:100%}}.contain .title-container{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin:16px 0}@media (max-width:991px){.contain .title-container{align-items:flex-start;flex-direction:column}}.contain .title-container .head-title p{color:#6d6a77;font-size:15px}.contain .title-container .head-title p a{color:#19ad7b;text-decoration:underline}.contain .title-container .options .reload{background-color:#19ad7b;border:none;color:#fff}@media (max-width:991px){.contain .title-container .options{margin-top:10px}}.contain .table-responsive{background-color:#fff;border-radius:8px}.contain .cat-tabel{height:calc(100vh - 274px);overflow-y:scroll}@media (max-width:991px){.contain .cat-tabel{height:calc(100vh - 320px)}}.contain .loading img{left:50%;position:absolute;top:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);width:50px}.contain tbody,.contain td,.contain tfoot,.contain th,.contain thead,.contain tr{padding:8px 15px;white-space:nowrap}.contain table{width:100%}.contain thead{background-color:#19ad7b;color:#fff}.contain td{color:#333;cursor:pointer;max-width:300px}.contain .pagination select{border:1px solid #dbdbdb;border-radius:8px;color:#333;padding:10px}.contain .pagination select :focus-visible,.contain .pagination select:focus{outline:none}.contain .pagination .page-item .page-link{border:none!important;cursor:pointer}.contain .pagination .page-item .page-link span{color:#6b7280;padding:.5rem 1rem}@media (max-width:768px){.contain .pagination .page-item .page-link span{padding:0}}.contain .pagination .page-item .page-link.page-num{color:#19ad7b}@media (max-width:520px){.contain .pagination .show-info{display:none!important}}.contain .rows{color:#000}.contain .rows:nth-child(2n){background-color:#eee}.contain .rows:nth-child(odd){background-color:#fff}.contain .rows .cat-img img{height:50px;margin-right:10px;width:50px}.contain .rows .cat-info h5,.contain .rows .cat-info p{max-width:200px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap}.contain .rows .cat-info p{font-size:14px}.contain .rows .badge{font-size:13px;padding:8px 12px}.contain .rows .circle{border:1px solid #cbc9c9;border-radius:50%;display:block;height:25px;width:25px}.contain .rows .delete,.contain .rows .edit{color:#333;padding:6px}.contain .rows .delete svg,.contain .rows .edit svg{font-size:20px}.drop-area{position:relative}.drop-area .p-fileupload{z-index:2}.drop-area img{-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;position:absolute;z-index:1}.clear{inset-inline-end:0;margin:10px;position:absolute;top:0;z-index:2}
